Package part09

Class PizzaStreams

java.lang.Object
part09.PizzaStreams
public class PizzaStreams extends Object
Pineapple is a controversial pizza topping. Some people love it, some people hate it. Some people even think that it's a crime against humanity to put pineapple on a pizza. In this exercise you will implement a few methods that can be used to select pizzas based on their personal preferences.

    • getPizzasWithTopping

      public Stream<Pizza> getPizzasWithTopping(Stream<Pizza> pizzas, String topping)
      Returns a stream of pizzas that have the given topping. Toppings are always in lower case.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - a stream of pizzas
      topping - the topping to look for
      Returns:
      a stream of pizzas that have the given topping

    • getPizzasWithAnyOfToppings

      public Stream<Pizza> getPizzasWithAnyOfToppings(Stream<Pizza> pizzas, List<String> toppings)
      Returns a stream of pizzas that have any of the toppings given as the second parameter. Toppings are always in lower case.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - a stream of pizzas
      toppings - the toppings to look for
      Returns:
      a stream of pizzas that have any of the given toppings

    • sortPizzasByPrice

      public Stream<Pizza> sortPizzasByPrice(Stream<Pizza> pizzas)
      Returns a stream of pizzas that is sorted by price in ascending order (cheapest first). If two pizzas have the same price, they can be in any order.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - a stream of pizzas
      Returns:
      a stream of pizzas that is sorted by price in ascending order

    • sortPizzasByName

      public Stream<Pizza> sortPizzasByName(Stream<Pizza> pizzas)
      Returns a stream of pizzas that is sorted by name in alphabetical order.
      Parameters:
      pizzas - a stream of pizzas
      Returns:
      a stream of pizzas that is sorted by name in alphabetical order
